stories.title: Happy Customers
stories.description: Join thousands of satisfied customers who trust Ritu Beauty for their fashion needs. We pride ourselves on quality and customer satisfaction.

stories.title: Sustainable Fashion
stories.description: We believe in ethical fashion. Our products are made with eco-friendly materials and sustainable practices.

stories.title: Crafted with Love
stories.description: Every piece is carefully designed and crafted by our talented team. Quality and style are at the heart of everything we do.
